{"id":938656479,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1682289218,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/938656479/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* makeRevList(long long n){\n        ListNode *head=new ListNode();\n        ListNode *temp=head;\n        while(true){\n            temp->val=n%10;\n            n/=10;\n            if(n){\n                ListNode *newNode=new ListNode();\n                temp->next=newNode;\n                temp=temp->next;\n            }\n            else\n            break;\n        }\n        return(head);\n    }\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        long long a=0,b=0,exp=0;\n        ListNode *temp=l1;\n        while(temp){\n            a+=(temp->val*pow(10,exp));\n            exp++;\n            temp=temp->next;\n        }\n        temp=l2;\n        exp=0;\n        while(temp){\n            b+=(temp->val*pow(10,exp));\n            exp++;\n            temp=temp->next;\n        }\n        return(makeRevList(a+b));\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
